creator: odi@odi.ch
text:
We are seeing ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException sometimes. Very hard to reproduce.
The TC version is the one bundeled with JBoss 4.0.4GA, which is 5.5 something.

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        at java.lang.System.arraycopy(Native Method)
        at org.apache.tomcat.util.buf.ByteChunk.append(ByteChunk.java:331)
        at org.apache.catalina.connector.OutputBuffer.writeBytes(OutputBuffer.ja
va:392)
        at org.apache.catalina.connector.OutputBuffer.write(OutputBuffer.java:38
1)
        at org.apache.catalina.connector.CoyoteOutputStream.write(CoyoteOutputSt
ream.java:88)
        at org.apache.catalina.servlets.DefaultServlet.copyRange(DefaultServlet.
java:2118)
        at org.apache.catalina.servlets.DefaultServlet.copy(DefaultServlet.java:
1842)
        at org.apache.catalina.servlets.DefaultServlet.serveResource(DefaultServ
let.java:889)
        at org.apache.catalina.servlets.DefaultServlet.doGet(DefaultServlet.java
:354)
        at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:697)
        at javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet.service(HttpServlet.java:810)

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 40719 ***
